attributes.action: To stop Stanborough students from going to school because of COVID-19.
attributes.additional_details: Because if we. the students. get Corona we could potentially be a 'germ carrier' and give it to our grandparents who're vulnerable.
attributes.background: Stop schools in Hertfordshire as it's the most affected place in England outside of London.

rejection.details:
The Government has closed all schools, colleges and universities.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
 
NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
